title: Reality Updates (w/ Joe DeRosa & Shannon Lee)
description: Jay sits down with cast of The Jersey Shore and they discuss Mike's time in prison. Joe DeRosa joins the show and him and Jay transform into no-nonsense principals. Shannon Lee gives an update on her prison love romance as the gang discusses "Love After Lockup."
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
